title: Ep 112: The Wedding Dress and the Facebook Group
itunes:title: Ep 112: The Wedding Dress and the Facebook Group
itunes:subtitle: Miracles happen, once in awhile!
description:
**Patreon subscribers received an ad-free, extended version of this episode last week. Want to be a Patreon? Sign up: https://www.patreon.com/geethanksandfriends** 


Gee Thanks! listener Ashley Hill had purchased her very expensive and very unique wedding dress over the phone at Neiman Marcus. They charged her card and told her the dress would be shipped out the next day. In between that phone call and the next day, an error in communication led Ashley's dress to be sold to someone else. 


There were no other dresses left. Neiman Marcus apologized and refunded her. But, they said, there's nothing else they can do. 


Hopeless and frustrated, Ashley went into the Gee Thanks! FB group to share the tale with the community. 


72 hours later, a wedding dress miracle happened. This episode tells the story.


Join the Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/geethanks 


Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod and shop all of our recs here: www.geethanksjustboughtit.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
